title: Power charge not working for 1 side of the cable, but worked after restarting until unplugged it
content:
Hi~ 
I got a Pixel 3, which work fine until recently.
As USB-C cable can be charge for both side plugged in, but now it can only charge for 1 side connected. 
Tried different cable and power plugged, still work same.

I found out if I connect the non-working side and restart it, it will work fine but only limit to charge slowly. If I unplugged and plugged it again, it won't work.

Any solution ?
